name: Spooky Typer
description:
A halloween themed typing game made only with free assets. Defeat the three waves and bring peace to your city.

Programming, music and design by Mortup.

Victory fanfare by Matthew Pablo (http://matthewpablo.com/services/)

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Skeleton sprites by Jesse Munguia (https://jesse-m.itch.io/skeleton-pack)

Knight sprites by Oco (https://oco.itch.io/medieval-fantasy-character-pack)

Background sprite by Cacay (https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/pixel-art-background-bundle-6313/)
